resources.nodes: Number of nodes to use for the job
resources.wtime: Maximum wall clock time for the job
resources.processes: Number of processes to run the simulation with
resources.ranks: Number of MPI ranks to use for the job
resources.mppwidth: Width of the MPI process grid
resources.submitdir: Directory to submit the job from
resources.bashtmpdir: Temporary directory to run the simulation in

other.cores: Number of cores to use for the job
other.dummyprocesses: Default number of processes, calculated from the number of cores
other.job_dir: Directory to store the job files
other.targetdir: Directory to store the output files
